# attributed

**Instance Property**

An attributed format style based on the floating-point currency format style.

## Declaration

```swift
var attributed: FloatingPointFormatStyle<Value>.Attributed { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this modifier to create a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FloatingPointFormatStyle/Attributed-swift.struct] instance, which formats values as [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedString] instances. These attributed strings contain attributes from the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/FoundationAttributes/NumberFormatAttributes] attribute scope. Use these attributes to determine which runs of the attributed string represent different parts of the formatted value.

## Creating attributed strings

- **FloatingPointFormatStyle.Attributed**: A format style that converts integers into attributed strings.
